-- ending hand #3 --
"Player3" @ seat #5 collected $7.50 from pot with a pair of aces
"Player1" @ seat #1 folds
"Player3" @ seat #5 bets $3.00
"Player2" @ seat #3 checks

"Player3" @ seat #5 calls $1.00
"Player1" @ seat #1 folds
"Player2" @ seat #3 raises to $3.00
Your hand is A♥, A♦
"Player3" @ seat #5 posts a big blind of $1.00
"Player2" @ seat #3 posts a small blind of $0.50
